blueprint.description: Installs MAAS on Ubuntu and automates some of the setup work
blueprint.overview: [MAAS](https://maas.io/) allows very fast server provisioning for your data centre. It allows self-service, remote installation of Windows, CentOS, ESXi and Ubuntu on real servers. It turns your data centre into a bare metal cloud.
blueprint.name: MAAS
blueprint.title: MAAS
